three.xr.js Examples

XR

  • xr/basic source

    Use Three.js to render a cube in a XR scene. Automatically detect what sessions (VR or AR) are available.

  • xr/debug source

    Use Three.js to render anchors from ARKit. Automatically detect what sessions (VR or AR) are available.

AR

  • ar/reticle source

    Use Three.js to place a reticle on surfaces in an AR scene.

  • ar/light source

    Use Three.js to place a reticle with a pin and light estimation on surfaces in an AR scene.
